Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
1432
End of the sessionClosing of the session
1433
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
1434
emotional learning
1435
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
1436
1437
 Day 42WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
1438
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
1439
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
1440
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the last days.
1441
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
1442
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
1443
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
1444
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
1445
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students what fun activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the fun activity again to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
1446
Fun activity with stick l Bottle race activity l Jump and action activity l Thumbs up, thumbs down fun activity l Fun activity with Glass
1447
1448
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students which Hindi activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Hindi activity again to the students briefly and make them excited.
1449
Barahkadi (ra-sha) l Barahkadi (ha- shra) l Magical Clock story in Hindi lbarahkadi se shabd banaye lbarahkadi se shabd padho
1450
1451
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which English activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the English activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1452
Explanation of Articles "A and An" luse of a and an lChubby Cheeks rhyme lExplanation of the Article lPractice sheet of a,an and the
1453
1454
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which Math's activities they did during the week and which Math's activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Math's activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1455
Between Numbers l Random identification of numbers 1-100 l Counting quiz l Biggest and Smallest number l
Table of 8 multiplication
1456
1457
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's recap, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which Computer topic they learnt during the week and which Computer topic they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Computer topic again to the students briefly and make the student listen carefully and Imagine/think about it.
1458
how to use in ms word l how to insert pictures in ms word l how to save files in ms word lsaving and printing a document l Shortcut keys
1459
1460
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
1461
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and recap the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
1462
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood all the concepts till now.
1463
1464
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
1465
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
1466
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
1467
End of the sessionClosing of the session
1468
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have recap the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which mindfulness activity they learnt during the week and which activity they liked the most .
1469
sesnses to feel grounded l clap yoga song l meditation l Be the pond mindfulness l emotional learning
1470
"Now give away simple homework like ""Get three grains available in your house"" or ""Get three type of soil"" or ""Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother"", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump."

1661
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which English activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the English activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1662
Teach Domestic animals l Teach Wild Animals l THE FOX and THE SOUR GRAPES Story l Teach Water animals lTeach Animals and their young ones
1663
mathra vale shabd l mathra ke shabd l Aloo kachaloo rhymes l ye ki mathra ke shabd l Chandra Bindu vale shabd
1664
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which Math's activities they did during the week and which Math's activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Math's activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1665
Ones and tens l ones and tens activity l Skip count by 10's l understand 10's l Table of 9 multiplication
1666
1667
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's recap, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which Computer topic they learnt during the week and which Computer topic they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Computer topic again to the students briefly and make the student listen carefully and Imagine/think about it.
1668
What is file and folder l what is multimedia l How to play music in laptop l editing photos l Audio recording
1669
1670
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
1671
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and recap the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
1672
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood all the concepts till now.
1673
1674
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
1675
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
1676
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
1677
End of the sessionClosing of the session
1678
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have recap the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which mindfulness activity they learnt during the week and which activity they liked the most .
1679
Emotions regulating activity l Tree guided meditation l calming meditation l Fly Like a Butterfly l mindful eyes
1680
"Now give away simple homework like ""Get three grains available in your house"" or ""Get three type of soil"" or ""Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother"", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump."
1681
1682
 Day 49WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
1683
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
1684
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
1685
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the day.
1686
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
1687
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
1688
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
1689
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
1690
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
1691
greeting activity
1692
1693
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and prepare them for the Hindi activity, start by playing the video of Hindi activity (mostly Riming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1694
aadhe vyanjan
1695
1696
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the English activity, start by playing the video of English activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1697
My Family
1698
1699
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Math's activity, start by playing the video of Math's activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1700
Addition Doubling Numbers Song
1701
1702
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
1703
Addition Doubling Numbers Song
1704
1705
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
1706
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
1707
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
1708
1709
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
1710
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
1711
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
1712
End of the sessionClosing of the session
1713
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
1714
 Breathing and Directing
1715
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
1716

Breathing and Directing l Calm Your Emotions l Balloon Man Practice l Bubble Bounce l Mindfulness Activities for Kids
1890
"Now give away simple homework like ""Get three grains available in your house"" or ""Get three type of soil"" or ""Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother"", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump."
1891
1892
 Day 55WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
1893
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
1894
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
1895
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the day.
1896
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
1897
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
1898
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
1899
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
1900
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
1901
Hand eye co ordination activity
1902
1903
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and prepare them for the Hindi activity, start by playing the video of Hindi activity (mostly Riming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1904
paryayvachi shabd
1905
1906
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the English activity, start by playing the video of English activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1907
Introducing Colors
1908
1909
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Math's activity, start by playing the video of Math's activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
1910
Additions with number line
1911
1912
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
1913
what is email and gmail
1914
1915
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
1916
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
1917
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
1918
1919
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
1920
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
1921
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
1922
End of the sessionClosing of the session
1923
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
1924
Rainbow relaxation
1925
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
1926

1933
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
1934
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
1935
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.

pic the ball

1947
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
1948
What is a Google account
1949
1950
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
1951
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
1952
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
1953
1954
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
1955
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
1956
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
1957
End of the sessionClosing of the session
1958
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
1959
Candle and flower breathing
1960
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.

Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
2070
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the last days.
2071
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
2072
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
2073
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
2074
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
2075
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students what fun activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the fun activity again to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.

Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
2127
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
2128
2129
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
2130
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2131
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2132
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2133
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
2134
sesnses to feel grounded
2135
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
2136
2137
 Day 62WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
2138
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
2139
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
2140
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the day.
2141
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
2142
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
2143
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
2144
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
2145
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
2146
Do the woogie boogie activity
2147
2148
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and prepare them for the Hindi activity, start by playing the video of Hindi activity (mostly Riming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.

2160

2166

Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.

Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students what fun activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the fun activity again to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.

2357
2358
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and prepare them for the Hindi activity, start by playing the video of Hindi activity (mostly Riming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2359
colours gk quiz
2360
2361
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the English activity, start by playing the video of English activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2362
blends-"gr" word family
2363
2364
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Math's activity, start by playing the video of Math's activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2365
2digit subtraction
2366
2367
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
2368
Do's and don'ts while using a computer
2369
2370
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
2371
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
2372
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
2373
2374
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
2375
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2376
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2377
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2378
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
2379
Tree guided meditation
2380
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
2381
2382
 Day 69WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
2383
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
2384
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
2385
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the day.
2386
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
2387
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
2388
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
2389
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
2390
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
2391
Alert activity
2392
2393
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and prepare them for the Hindi activity, start by playing the video of Hindi activity (mostly Riming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2394
adivar kavitha
2395
2396
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the English activity, start by playing the video of English activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2397
The Lion and The Cows story
2398
2399
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Math's activity, start by playing the video of Math's activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2400
subtraction with borrow
2401
2402
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
2403
How to Use Wordpad
2404
2405
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
2406
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
2407
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
2408
2409
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
2410
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2411
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2412
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2413
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
2414
calming meditation
2415
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.

During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students what fun activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the fun activity again to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.

CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
2593
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
2594
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
2595
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the day.
2596
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
2597
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
2598
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
2599
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
2600
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
2601
jumping activfor kids
2602
2603
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and prepare them for the Hindi activity, start by playing the video of Hindi activity (mostly Riming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2604
Real friend story
2605
2606
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the English activity, start by playing the video of English activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2607
The Dog Says Bow Wow rhyme
2608
2609
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Math's activity, start by playing the video of Math's activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2610
Guess the shapes
2611
2612
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
2613
how to use scratch
2614
2615
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
2616
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
2617
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
2618
2619
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
2620
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2621
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2622
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2623
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
2624
Balloon Man Practice
2625
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
2626
2627
 Day 76WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
2628
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
2629
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
2630
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the day.
2631
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
2632
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
2633
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
2634
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
2635
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
2636
Cups activity
2637
2638
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and prepare them for the Hindi activity, start by playing the video of Hindi activity (mostly Riming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2639
Guess the fruit
2640
2641
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the English activity, start by playing the video of English activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2642
Introducing Parts of the Body
2643
2644
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Math's activity, start by playing the video of Math's activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2645
ABAB pattern
2646
2647
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
2648
ABAB pattern
2649
2650
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
2651
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
2652
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
2653
2654
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
2655
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2656
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2657
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2658
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
2659
Bubble Bounce
2660
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
2661

2669

Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.

2678
2679

2687

2688
2689
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
2690
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2691
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2692
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2693

2694
Mindfulness Activities for Kids
2695
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.

2697
 Day 78WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
2698
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
2699
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
2700
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the last days.
2701
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
2702
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
2703
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
2704
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
2705
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students what fun activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the fun activity again to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
2706
clap,tap and catch the ball activity lactivities for physical education ljumping activfor kids lCups activity lmove and stop activity
2707
2708
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students which Hindi activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Hindi activity again to the students briefly and make them excited.
2709
Read words lFruit Names in Hindi & English lReal friend story lGuess the fruit lVegetables Name Hindi & English
2710
2711
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which English activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the English activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2712
Teaching Good Habits lIntroducing Seasons lThe Dog Says Bow Wow rhyme lIntroducing Parts of the Body lTeaching Actions Words
2713
2714
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which Math's activities they did during the week and which Math's activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Math's activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2715
2D shapes l 3D shapes l Guess the shapes l ABAB pattern l Table of 14 multiplication
2716
2717
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's recap, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which Computer topic they learnt during the week and which Computer topic they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Computer topic again to the students briefly and make the student listen carefully and Imagine/think about it.
2718
coding sequence l block based coding l how to use scratch l how to create simple animation using scratch l Basic quiz
2719
2720
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
2721
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and recap the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
2722
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood all the concepts till now.
2723
2724
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
2725
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2726
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2727
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2728
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have recap the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which mindfulness activity they learnt during the week and which activity they liked the most .
2729
Breathing and Directing l Calm Your Emotions l Balloon Man Practice l Bubble Bounce l Mindfulness Activities for Kids
2730
"Now give away simple homework like ""Get three grains available in your house"" or ""Get three type of soil"" or ""Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother"", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump."

2760

2828
2829
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
2830
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2831
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2832
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2833
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
2834
Square breathing
2835
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
2836
2837
 Day 82WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
2838
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
2839
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
2840
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the day.
2841
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
2842
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
2843
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
2844
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
2845
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
2846
Rope activity
2847
2848
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and prepare them for the Hindi activity, start by playing the video of Hindi activity (mostly Riming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2849
 Animals
2850
2851
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the English activity, start by playing the video of English activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2852
Types of Trees
2853
2854
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Math's activity, start by playing the video of Math's activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2855
Subtraction in abacus
2856
2857
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
2858
cuber security
2859
2860
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
2861
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
2862
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
2863
2864
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
2865
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2866
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2867
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2868
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
2869
The Body Scanner
2870
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.

CLAS - Computer Literacy At School

WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail

Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
2910
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the last days.
2911
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
2912
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
2913
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
2914
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
2915
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students what fun activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the fun activity again to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
2916
Standing Line Activity l Jump Jump Jump l Putting the ball in the circle according to the number l Rope activity l Cup race activity
2917
2918
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students which Hindi activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Hindi activity again to the students briefly and make them excited.
2919
vegetables quiz l Flower Names in Hindi l lakdiki kathi rhyme l Animals l wild animals
2920
2921
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which English activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the English activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2922
Opposite words l Explanation of Insects l Don't waste food moral story l Types of Trees l Different types of leaves
2923
2924
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which Math's activities they did during the week and which Math's activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Math's activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
2925
Skip count by 5s lnumbers in Abacus lAdditions in abacus lSubtraction in abacus l Table of 15 multiplication
2926
2927
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's recap, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which Computer topic they learnt during the week and which Computer topic they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Computer topic again to the students briefly and make the student listen carefully and Imagine/think about it.
2928
digital citizenship l Digital footprints l online privacy l cuber security l how to use usb drive
2929
2930
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
2931
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and recap the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
2932
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood all the concepts till now.
2933
2934
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.

Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
2936
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
2937
End of the sessionClosing of the session
2938

3064
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Math's activity, start by playing the video of Math's activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
3065
multiplication of 2 digits by 1 digit
3066
3067
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
3068
what is an artificial intelligence
3069
3070
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
3071
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
3072
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
3073
3074
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
3075
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
3076
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
3077
End of the sessionClosing of the session
3078
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
3079
Be the pond mindfulness
3080
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
3081
3082
 Day 89WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
3083
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
3084
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
3085
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the day.
3086
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
3087
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
3088
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
3089
Action passing Game
3090
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
3091
January Months to December
3092
3093

 Day 90WES Foundation Education Program
CLAS - Computer Literacy At School
3118
WhenWhatDurationHow/What in detail
3119
Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).
3120
2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the last days.
3121
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
3122
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
3123
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
3124
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
3125
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students what fun activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the fun activity again to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
3126
Energizer with spoon l Shape Dance l count and jump activity lFinger clap energizer l Action passing Game
3127
3128
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students which Hindi activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Hindi activity again to the students briefly and make them excited.
3129
Sea animals l Animals quiz l Lalchi lomdi story l Birds Name in Hindi & English l January Months to December
3130
3131
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which English activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the English activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
3132

3133
3134
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and ask the students which Math's activities they did during the week and which Math's activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the Math's activity again to the students briefly and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.

3138

3139

3141
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and recap the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
3142

3143

20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
3145
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
3146
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.

During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, explain the fun activity to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
3301
Warm Up Activity
3302
3303
5 Minutes2. Now that the students have enjoyed the fun activity, make them settle down into their seat and prepare them for the Hindi activity, start by playing the video of Hindi activity (mostly Riming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
3304
read opposite words
3305
3306
5 Minutes3. Now that the students have enjoyed the Hindi activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the English activity, start by playing the video of English activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
3307
parts of a house vocabulary
3308
3309
5 Minutes4. Now that the students have enjoyed the English activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Math's activity, start by playing the video of Math's activity (mostly rhyming video) and make the student sing and dance to the rhyming tune ensuring the enjoy the most.
3310
table of 17 multiplication
3311
3312
8 Minutes5. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English and Math's activity, make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for the Computer activity, start by playing the video of Computer topic (mostly short videos) and make the student listen carefully and Imagin/think about it.
3313
Binary Number system
3314
3315
8 Minutes6. Once the video is completed, please explain the student topic in detail in the most simplified language using local examples.
3316
Allow the students to ask questions, if the students aren't asking questions, Please ask questions in an encouraging way and explain the concept again as needed to confirm their understanding.
3317
Give the task to the students to perform in a group as much as possible. Example, request one/two of the students to come forward n draw the monitor into the blackboard using the chalk. Or something similar to ensure that they understood the concept.
3318
3319
20 Minutes7. Now the students have done all the activates, you had planned to them. Its time to let them play video game so select the best performing student and invite them to play the video game of their choice for 5mins, if needed let them play in pair.
3320
Allow all the other students to watch the best performing students play the video game, make cheer for the student playing like clapping or chanting his/her name.
3321
Allow at least 4 students or 4 pairs to play, 5 mins each student/pair, All the other students should encouraged to perform well in the class so that they get to play video game. Keeping in mind that Video Game should be treated as an incentive, so if they perform well, they get to play video game as a reward/incentive.
3322
End of the sessionClosing of the session
3323
2 Minutes8. Now that the students have enjoyed the Energizer, Hindi, English, Math's activity, computer activity and played Video Game , make them settle down again into their seat and prepare them for a mindfulness activity.
3324
mindful eyes
3325
Now give away simple homework like "Get three grains available in your house" or "Get three type of soil" or "Ask and learn from your mother about her grand mother", which they should not be obliged to do, it must be on their will. Tell them to come tomorrow and also bring their friends. While you leave the class, greet every student with high five or Fist Bump.
3326

CLAS - Computer Literacy At School

Before the sessionPlan and prepare for the session10 Minutes1. Review and remember the activity conducted last day(s).

2. Already watch all the videos content and activity for the last days.
3331
3. Keep all the teaching aid you need to do the activity. Some of the aids students really enjoy are balloons, ice cream sticks, straws etc.
3332
4. If you plan to reward the students, keep some candies or toffees.
3333
5. Try to visualize all the possible scenarios and questions from the students or no questions.
3334
6. Plan to get most learning outcomes from the students, specially those who like to participate less.
3335
During the session - Keep saying "The best performing students will get to play Video Game"Execute the day's session5 Minutes1. Start by gathering the students into one place like large classroom/open space where the group of students can gathered for an energizer activity. Use the sentences like Chalo baccho fun activity karenge.
Once the students are all seated and ready, ask the students what fun activities they did during the week and which activity they liked the most, based on what they liked explain the fun activity again to the students briefly and make them excited. Play the fun activity video for the students in the laptop and as needed do the activity with them. Make sure they enjoy the most.
